wikipedia_page.main:
Simon Thomas John Cowley (born 8 November 1979) is a former English cricketer.  Cowley was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm off break.  He was born at Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire.
Cowley played a single Minor Counties Championship match in 1999 for Herefordshire against Oxfordshire.In 2000, he represented the Gloucestershire Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Derbyshire Cricket Board in the 2000 NatWest Trophy at the Town Ground, Heanor.  In his only List A match, he scored 8 runs.

response: Simon Cowley (born 4 October 1980) is a former Australian breaststroke swimmer.
